channel.title: {Recruiting} Airborne Pk ~!~!~!
channel.description:
Hello and i am going to start a new source from scratch
My ideas for the server are...
1. kinda hard to get money (like rs but not as bad) 2. maybe dueling 3. pking /working skills server (dodian has working skills i like that but pking and dueling sucks...) 4. working economy items are priced and a up and running server by christmas
Server Positions
1 coder 1 Forums/Website hoster 2 player mods 0 Head Admin must be on server 8 hours a day+ (t00k)
Application
Position- Experience in that position- Do you agree with my ideas for server?-
Thanks and let any 1 join :) :P
Msn- Slip_knot1208@hotmail.com
